content.raw:
The scene has other functions like `createPlane`, `createBox`, etc. How about `createFromSDF`?

And note that those functions don't automatically add the created object to the scene, instead, they return an object, and it is the responsibility of whoever called create to add the created object either to the scene or another object.

Also, don't forget to remove the function from spawnmodel ;)
content.html:
The scene has other functions like createPlane, createBox, etc. How about createFromSDF?

And note that those functions don't automatically add the created object to the scene, instead, they return an object, and it is the responsibility of whoever called create to add the created object either to the scene or another object.

Also, don't forget to remove the function from spawnmodel ;)
